trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Queensbury
There were no other sightings in Queensbury on or around September 6th 2009
Summary: Distant light making strange maneuvers looked like a distant plane going extremely fast
divs: sighting detailsme and my dad were looking at a balloon in the sky, joking it was a ufo ironically and i kept looking into the sky and i saw what looked like a distant plane going really fast and i said to him look how fast that is going and it took a very sharp left then a right and made a small cursive o and flew off even faster into the distance...we were at toys r us which is 50 feet from the taco bell where my four friends and saw a ufo 9\19\09 which i reported as well
